comments.content: Yes it is. It's been changing slightly from the sixties.

If you only want to mimic the effect, Eclat can be a good starting ponit.   
   
 [http://www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.asp?pid=405832](http://web.archive.org/web/20100121180430/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.asp?pid=405832)

If you need the logo, you can download it from "la logoteca"   
   
 [http://www.visual.gi/logoteca/logos\_c.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100121180430/http:/www.visual.gi/logoteca/logos_c.html)   
   
There are two files. They are not perfect, but perhaps there are good enough for your project.
It's highly probable this is a custom designed logo.
